content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Limited budget individuals struggle to pay for tuition or education expenses",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A platform that connects individuals with employers who offer tuition reimbursement or subsidies",
    "content_solution": "An online course on how to negotiate tuition reimbursement with employers",
    "competitors": "EdAssist, Guild Education, Bright Horizons",
    "differentiator": "Our platform focuses specifically on connecting individuals with low budgets to employers offering tuition assistance, and our content product provides actionable steps to successfully negotiate tuition reimbursement"
  }
]
